headline: Global Telecom Engineering Announces Successful 2025 Certification of TITAN5000, TITAN5100, and TITAN5400 Across All Major U.S. Carriers
summary: NEWPORT BEACH, Calif., December 11, 2025--Global Telecom Engineering, Inc. (www.glob-tel.com), a leader in high-performance fixed wireless hardware and connectivity solutions, today announced the successful completion of device certification for its TITAN5000 and TITAN5100 product lines across T-Mobile, Verizon, and UScellular. These certifications mark a major milestone in the company’s 2025 roadmap and solidify its position as a fully carrier-approved provider of reliable, scalable fixed wirel

headline: Eiotclub Launches Black Friday Offer: Up to 20% Off Triple Play SIM for Smarter IoT Connectivity
summary: Seattle, Washington, Dec. 11, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Eiotclub has announced its Black Friday campaign offering up to 20% off its USA Triple Play SIM Card, providing a timely incentive for users seeking reliable IoT connectivity solutions. Whether you're deploying surveillance systems, remote sensors, or mobile tech, Eiotclub’s Triple Play solution ensures your devices stay connected—now with even more value built in. Designed to Give Users Greater Control and Flexibility in a Rapidly Expanding

headline: Denver Broncos and Verizon Business enhance stadium operations and fan experiences
summary: Verizon Business upgrades Empower Field at Mile High to Wi-Fi 6E-ready networkNEW YORK, Dec. 11, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Fans at Empower Field at Mile High, home of the Denver Broncos, can now enjoy a significantly upgraded game-day experience thanks to the new Wi-Fi 6E and Local Area Network (LAN) installation led by Verizon Business. headline: 1 Large-Cap Stock for Long-Term Investors and 2 Facing Challenges
summary: Large-cap stocks are known for their staying power and ability to weather market storms better than smaller competitors. However, their sheer size makes it more challenging to maintain high growth rates as they’ve already captured significant portions of their markets.

raw.headline: 1 Large-Cap Stock for Long-Term Investors and 2 Facing Challenges

headline: AT&T follows T-Mobile with bold move to win back customers
summary: There is no doubt that AT&T has been operating in a challenging market that is experiencing heightened competition as phone carriers and even cable companies battle for new customers with increased promotions.
